document_data.name: ''Subtle Blades''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Subtle blades''''' were [[enchanted]] [[dagger]]s used by [[rogue]]s and [[assassin]]s. They could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: Especially when dual-wielded, ''subtle blades'' could be used to make attacks that appeared to be at once both feints and strikes. Their enchantment meant that they were particularly effective for disarming an opponent.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Naomlen Girdaur]], a [[dwarf]] rogue and member of the [[Zhentarim]] who worked as an [[adventurer]] on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]], the [[Open Lord]] of Waterdeep, during the late 15{{th}} century DR. She was known to dual-wielded two ''subtle blades''.
